archimate:Principle.name: Feasibility
archimate:Principle.documentation:
Services and offerings shall be developed based on documented designs and plans. The designs are maintained and updated throughout the service lifecycle.​
Transformations, designs and project plans needs to consider feasibility to execute the plan and mitigate related risks.​
Designs need to strive for flexibility of the services/solutions to achieve long-term feasibility of the service in changing business environment.​
All development plans of new service/offering, internal development, and architecturally significant changes to service/offering/platform shall be reviewed according to defined processes. A High-Level Design needs to be produced and reviewed for new service/offering, and architecturally significant changes. Reviews of these artefacts must be conducted by assigned Enterprise Architect.​
